newsitem.title: USA: Gensia Sicor names John Sayward CFO.
newsitem.headline: Gensia Sicor names John Sayward CFO.

text.p: Gensia Sicor Inc said Thursday it named John Sayward vice president, finance, chief financial officer and treasurer, replacing Daniel Burgess who was appointed president of Gensia Automedics.
Gensia Automedics is a newly formed medical products business which is a subsidiary of Gensia Sicor.
Sayward joined Gensia in 1992 and most recently was division vice president, finance, corporate controller of Gensia and chief financial officer of Gensia Laboratories Ltd.
Gensia Sicor Inc is a specialty pharmaceutical company.
